mapper.select: select * from tf_ac_stock tas left outer join tf_stock ts on tas.TF_PRD_BARCODE = ts.TF_PRD_BARCODE and tas.STORE_CD = ts.STOCK_STORE_CD where tas.STORE_CD = #{item}
select TF_PRD_NM as tfPrdNm, tas.REG_DATE as regDate from tf_ac_stock tas inner join tf_stock ts on tas.TF_PRD_BARCODE = ts.TF_PRD_BARCODE where tas.TF_PRD_TAGID = #{item} limit 1
select TF_PRD_TAGID from tf_ac_stock where TF_PRD_BARCODE = #{item}
